page.title: 04A SCHOOLGIRL'S DAY continued
page.content:
{A day in the life of Jayne Thomas {continued.}
I am school dinners and most of my friends are school dinners so we talk a lot.The school dinners are nice sometimes.We come out of dinner at 1.00pm and the packed lunches go in for their dinner until 1.30pm,while we have our playtime.The whistle goes at 1.30pm.We come in and do our topic.
Our topic is "The Domesday Project",we do this until 2.45pm and then we go out to play.At 3.00pm we come in and have a story.The bus children go at 3.30pm and the town children go at 3.45pm.
I walk with my friend to the car park and my mum picks us up there and takes us home.
